import sys
t=int(raw_input())
for _ in range(t):
	a=map(int,raw_input().split())
	minm=a[1]
	minnum=1
	for i in range(1,10):
		if(a[i]<minm):
			minm=a[i]
			minnum=i
	if(a[0]<minm):
		minm=a[0]
		minnum=0
	if(minnum!=0):
		x=1
		for i in range(minm):
			x=x*10+1
		print x*minnum
	else:
		print 10**(minm+1)
